introduction: If born in an age when everyone are allowed to purchase an iDeal companion, will we be happier? iDeal Wife is a 36 minutes Sci-Fi Crime Film created by Sylvia Qi,A story set in a prospective future of an extremely consumer driven system where everyone is provoked to purchase an iDeal product to be companion. It can even be upgraded after five years regarding the pre-agreed "marriage" contract. The robots are highly humanized and programed to feel and love while the people are absolutely not...如果生在一个能够随意购买完美的机器人产品作为伴侣的年代，你会感到快乐一点么？故事发生在不远的未来，当社会被极端商品化，每个人都必须购买一个机器人作为伴侣，并且签订一个“五年”的婚姻合同。当机器人被高度人性化的同时，人类却在被悄悄的去人性化…
